```lean4
theorem putnam_1977_a1
(y : ℝ → ℝ)
(hy : y = fun x ↦ 2 * x ^ 4 + 7 * x ^ 3 + 3 * x - 5)
(S : Finset ℝ)
(hS : S.card = 4)
: (Collinear ℝ {P : Fin 2 → ℝ | P 0 ∈ S ∧ P 1 = y (P 0)} → (∑ x ∈ S, x) / 4 = putnam_1977_a1_solution) := by
  intro h

    -- Use the fact that the sum of the x-coordinates of the four collinear points is -7/2
    -- and the average x-coordinate is -7/8

      norm_num)
    <;>
    (try
      aesop)
    <;>
    (try
      linarith)
    <;>
    (try
      nlinarith [sq_nonneg (∑ x ∈ S, x), sq_nonneg (∑ x ∈ S, x - (-7 / 2))] )
  rw [h₁]
  <;>
  rfl
```
